QuestData.Title: The Lesson of Dry Fur
QuestData.Description: Through meditation, I intend to find a route to locating Shu. In the meantime, you would benefit from practice and discipline.$B$BYour first task is the task of all trainees entering the pools: cross the balance poles to the west and ring the bell without falling into the pool.$B$BShould you fall, the pool's curse will make it difficult to get on a pole again, so you will need to return to the edge of the pool to start over.$B$BOh, and beware the cranes.
QuestData.LogDescription: Cross the balance poles and ring the training bell.
